markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Changeling](/Traits.aspx?ID=212)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait has the changeling versatile heritage. Changelings are the children of [hags](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=59) and members of other [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) ancestries. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by changelings.
name: Changeling
